item.title: Tricks in Javascript
item.description: 1 + 1 If we fill an empty array with 4 zero-filled: let arr = [...Array(4).fill([...Array(4).fill(0)])] arr[1][2] = 1; arr let arr = Array.from({ length: 4}, e => Array(4).fill(0)); arr[1][2] = 1; arr fsfafwe
